cards.flavor: “Run, run as fast as you can! The war is lost, all hope is gone!”
cards.name: Abandon the Ranks
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters, return each other creature controlled by the same player to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The volcanoes of Lafterwal used to erupt constantly until, annoyed for the distraction they caused, the Lafterii decided to silence them.
cards.name: Abrupt Volley
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

cards.name: Adamant Healer
cards.text: When Adamant Healer enters, you may move any number of counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.

cards.flavor:
“We must learn to endure this creature's curse, or we won't be able to stop it.”
—Pandora, Warden of Khaliz-Dorahn
cards.name: Adapt or Die
cards.text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token.

cards.name: Amber Hills

rulings.text: You can search for any card with the subtypes Forest and/or Plains.

cards.text:
As Amber Hills enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Amber Hills enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Amber Hills: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Arcane Harvesters
cards.text:
{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{R}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Arcane Harvesters deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Lafterii humans often wonder if elementals are smarter than them. What they do know is that they see the world in whole new ways.
cards.name: Arcanist's Familiar
cards.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

cards.flavor: Most Lafterii are not content with experimenting with a spell just once.
cards.name: Arcanomancer
cards.text: When Arcanomancer enters, return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: The first ax is a mere diversion, for in parrying it the second one strikes your heart.
cards.name: Barbarian Axe Flinger
cards.text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}: Barbarian Axe Flinger gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“War is about strength, but also about attitude.”
—Fellor saying
cards.name: Barbarian Battle Rage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has menace and “{1}{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.”

cards.name: Barbarian Intimidator
cards.text:
When Barbarian Intimidator enters, target creature can't block this turn.
When Barbarian Intimidator enters, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

cards.flavor: When a Fellor attacks, he does so without caring about things as menial as self preservation.
cards.name: Barbarian Rager
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Barbarian Rager and at least two other creatures attack, Barbarian Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The weapons he crafts have the same ferocity as his soul.
cards.name: Barbarian Weaponsmith
cards.text:
Other Warriors you control have first strike.
Other Barbarians you control get +1/+0.

cards.flavor: Fellors rarely attack from the back, but when they do, they do it with the ferocity they're known for.
cards.name: Barbaric Ambusher
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Barbaric Ambusher and at least two other creatures attack, you may tap target creature.

cards.flavor: He leaves a piece of himself in every battle.
cards.name: Battle-Scarred Combatant
cards.text: Whenever Battle-Scarred Combatant attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Battle for the Shield

rulings.text: These are anchor words, and not modes.

cards.text:
As Battle for the Shield enters, choose Danuri or Fellor.
• Danuri — Soldiers you control get +0/+1 and have vigilance.
• Fellor — Warriors you control get +1/+0 and have first strike.

cards.name: Battle the Evil One

rulings.text: These are anchor words, and not modes.

cards.text:
As Battle the Evil One enters, choose Evil One or Rehison.
• Evil One — Zombie creature cards in your graveyard have unearth {3}{B}. ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
• Rehison — Whenever an Elf you control enters, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.flavor: “Give me a weapon and a target, and I'll handle the rest.”
cards.name: Battleborn Brute
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Battleborn Brute and at least two other creatures attack, Battleborn Brute gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap it.

cards.name: Battlewise Strategist
cards.text:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
Identity — Other creatures you control get +0/+1 as long as you control at least two other creatures that share a creature type with Battlewise Strategist.

cards.flavor:
“Let my blessing fill you, let my touch help you grow.”
—Pandora, Warden of Khaliz-Dorahn
cards.name: Blessing of Might
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has “{G}: Regenerate this creature.”

cards.name: Blightbringer
cards.text:
When Blightbringer enters, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
“Whatever it touches gets consumed upon contact, do you really think we stand a chance against such a creature?”
—Heletrios, to Pandora
cards.name: Blighted Reckoning
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Blighting Ooze
cards.text:
When Blighting Ooze enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.
As long as Blighting Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Boiling Ridge
cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Boiling Ridge enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Many tried to conquer the Darklands and make them into a habitable place. Those who did are now brainless undead, roaming the land they sought to make theirs.
cards.name: Brainless Wanderers
Bravery
cards.text:
Double strike
{1}{R}{W}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Activate only if Bravery is in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Archery evens any battlefield.”
cards.name: Bring Down
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with flying.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Fellor's are trained in most forms of combat, but close combat is their favorite, since facing their opponents face to face motivates them to fight harder.
cards.name: Brutal Onslaught
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: His students are full of scars he inflicted upon them. When they manage to scar him, they're ready for battle.
cards.name: Callous Trainer
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Callous Trainer and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.

cards.flavor: The Lafterii know a dozen ways of saying “no”.
cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Chain of Command

rulings.text: If Chain of Command can't become attached to that creature, it will remain in the graveyard.

cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to enchanted creature's mana cost minus 1, put it onto the battlefield, and attach Chain of Command to it, then shuffle.

cards.name: Clairvoyant Mage
cards.text: When Clairvoyant Mage enters, scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: “When all else fails, there's always the old ‘What's that behind you?' trick.”
cards.name: Clever Diversion
cards.text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

cards.flavor: “Knowledge always finds its way around all obstacles.”
cards.name: Clever Infiltrator
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Infiltrator gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: “Join or die. Maybe even both.”
cards.name: Coercive Methods
cards.text: Target player reveals two cards at random from their hand. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor: “Is that your best?”
cards.name: Contemptuous Teacher
cards.text:
Prowess
{1}{U}, Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Controlled Decisions
cards.text:
Reverberate {3} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost. You may choose new targets for the copy.)
Target creature can't block this turn.
Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Those few who survived the Evil One's touch died shortly after to its corruption.
cards.name: Crippling Illness
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Cutthroat Deceiver
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Cutthroat Deceiver enters with four -1/-1 counters on it.
{3}{B}, {T}: Move a -1/-1 counter from Cutthroat Deceiver onto another target creature.

cards.name: Danuri Charm
cards.text:
Choose one—
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
• Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +0/+3 and gain reach until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “The Fellors enjoy the savagery of griffins. We prefer the majesty of the eagles.”
cards.name: Danuri Eaglerider
cards.text: Identity — As long as you control at least two other creatures that share a creature type with Danuri Eaglerider, Danuri Eaglerider gets +1/+2 and has flying.

cards.flavor: The Danuri endure Fellor assaults as a team, with formations so tight it's almost impossible to get past them.
cards.name: Danuri Phalanx
cards.text:
Vigilance
{2}{G}: Danuri Phalanx gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

cards.name: Danuri Warcaller
cards.text: Identity — When Danuri Warcaller enters, if you control at least two other creatures that share a creature type with it, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Darklands Charm
cards.text:
Choose one—
• Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Fellors admire griffins both for their beauty and their fighting skills.
cards.name: Dawnglory Griffin
cards.text: Flying, haste

cards.flavor: When the Evil One treaded Khaliz-Dorahn, it killed everyone standing on Its path and infected those who didn't.
cards.name: Deadly Infection
cards.text: Destroy target creature. You may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Deadly Manipulation

rulings.text: You still pay the mana cost and any additional costs of the copied instant or sorcery spell.

cards.text:
{U}, Discard a card: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, copy it. You may cast the copy.
{B}, Discard a card: Exile target creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Decay
cards.text:
Decay deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.
{B}{G}: Until end of turn, target creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters. Activate only if Decay is in your graveyard.

cards.name: Deception
cards.text:
Deception can't be blocked.
{1}{U}{B}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Activate only if Deception is in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The only two things the Rehisons truly care about are their people and their home.
cards.name: Dedicated Druid
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}. If a -1/-1 counter was put on a creature you control this turn, add {G}{G} instead.

cards.name: Dementia's Clutch
cards.text:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Dementia's Clutch, target player discards a card.

cards.flavor: “Please, don't even try.”
cards.name: Denied Attempt
cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Denied Attempt, you may tap target creature.

cards.text:
Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
Wizardcycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Dictate of Pandora
cards.text:
Elf creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
Elfcycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Dictate of Rallios
cards.text:
Dictate of Rallios deals damage to any target equal to the number of Warriors you control.
Warriorcycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Warrior card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Dictate of the Evil One
cards.text:
Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
Zombiecycling {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Zombie card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Dictate of the Triumvirate
cards.text:
Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
Soldiercycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Soldier card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.flavor:
“When their minds are empty and their bodies rotten, then they're ready to come back and serve me.”
—The Evil One
cards.name: Disentomb
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Some Lafterii get easily distracted and it takes more time for them to achieve results. However, they happen to be the most imaginative wizards, and when they finish their goals the result is usually spectacular.
cards.name: Distracted Researcher

cards.flavor: It will drag those surrounding it to the grave, then step on their corpses to escape it.
cards.name: Dredging Aberration
cards.text: {1}{B}, Mill three cards: Return Dredging Aberration from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Driver of Hordes
cards.text:
When Driver of Hordes enters, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
Duskwood Thicket enters tapped.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: The Duskwood, the region in Rehis-Dorahn where the forest and the marsh meet, is filled of creatures the Rehisons were always careful not to disturb.
cards.name: Duskwood Traverser
Dusty Record
cards.text:
{T}: Target player mills a card.
{4}, {T}, Exile Dusty Record: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

cards.flavor: With uncanny speed the forces of Khaliz-Dorahn appeared, ready to defeat Rallios.
cards.name: Element of Surprise
cards.text: The next creature spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. When that creature enters this turn, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

cards.name: Elementalize

rulings.text: The ability losing effect is a static effect, so the creature can't gain other abilities. It's power and toughness can change.

cards.text:
Reverberate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost. You may choose new targets for the copy.)
Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Elemental with base power and toughness 3/3.

cards.name: Elspeth, Protector of the Meek
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
[-1]: Another target permanent you control gains indestructible until your next turn.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +2/+2.” and “Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.”

cards.flavor:
“You're the best ally we could have asked for. With you by our side, justice will be finally done in Khaliz-Dorahn.”
—Rallios, to Elspeth
cards.name: Elspeth's Intervention
cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: “You were going after me? Sorry, try again.”
cards.name: Elusive Illusionist
cards.text:
Flash
When Elusive Illusionist enters, target attacking creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “The Poisonblades have chosen you as a candidate to join us, do you accept the responsibility?”

cards.text: Elfcycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.flavor: The force of nature drives some creatures more than others.
cards.name: Embodiment of Brawn

Trample
Other Elementals you control get +1/+0 and have trample.

cards.flavor: It soars the skies with the strength of a hundred winds.
cards.name: Embodiment of Heavens

Flying
Other Elementals you control get +0/+1 and have flying.

cards.flavor: Nature's rage can be contagious.
cards.name: Embodiment of Ire
cards.text:
Haste
Other Elementals you control get +1/+0 and have haste.

cards.flavor: When Rallios lost himself to his true nature, he realized he had newfound powers.
cards.name: Empty the Tombs
cards.text: Exile target player's graveyard.

cards.name: Enlistment Officer
cards.text:
First strike
When Enlistment Officer enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+2.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

Prowess

Flying
When Ethereal Savior enters, you may return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

As Evil One's Mind Tricks enters choose Lafterii or Evil One.

cards.flavor:
“Maybe in the next life you'll be more useful.”
—Lafterii insult

cards.flavor: To some, a fighting machine; to others, a piece of furniture.

cards.flavor: Some Danuri still hear the voices of those who died during the War against the Evil One.

cards.text: When Fading Memories enters, exile target creature card from a graveyard.

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
{1}{G}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Activate only during your upkeep and only if Faith is in your graveyard.

cards.name: Fatestitcher
cards.text:
{T}: You may tap or untap another target permanent.

cards.flavor: “I do not fear death if it means the triumph of my people.”
cards.name: Fearless General

First strike

cards.flavor: When they advance, their enemies tremble.
cards.name: Fearsome Army
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Fearsome Army and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The Fellors are only allowed to heal their wounds when they've done a minimum of damage in battle.
cards.name: Fellor Bloodseeker
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Fellor Bloodseeker and at least two other creatures attack, Fellor Bloodseeker gains lifelink until end of turn.

cards.name: Fellor Charm
cards.text:
Choose one—
• Fellor Charm deals 3 damage to any target.
• Target creature gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.
• Attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Fellors are trained as warriors since the moment they're born. Once they're thirteen, they join the ranks in the assaults against the Shield until their death.
cards.name: Fellor Grunt

cards.flavor: Fellors are trained to hit their enemies where it hurts the most.
cards.name: Fellor Heartstriker
cards.text:
Haste
{1}{W}: Fellor Heartstriker gains lifelink until end of turn.

cards.flavor: To some, no music is sweeter than the sounds of screams and the clash of metal.
cards.name: Fellor Raider
cards.text: Battalion — Whenever Fellor Raider and at least two other creatures attack, Fellor Raider deals 2 damage to defending player.

cards.flavor: The rugged terrain of both Fellories mimics the brutality of their inhabitants.

cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Fellor Razer deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a land.

cards.flavor: He charges with confidence, and the rest follow in his wake.
cards.name: Fellor Tactician
cards.text:
Haste
Battalion — Whenever Fellor Tactician and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Never anger a Lafterii, especially if she's bored.
cards.name: Flame Jolt
cards.text: Flame Jolt deals 2 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor:
Chasing faeries
—Lafterii expression meaning “wasting your time.”
cards.name: Fleeting Distractor
cards.text:
Flying
When Fleeting Distractor enters, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Floodwater Depths
cards.text:
As Floodwater Depths enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Floodwater Depths enters tapped.

cards.flavor: The second Pandora's hands came into contact with each other a cataclysm occurred: the third sun was destroyed, the other planeswalkers died, and the Evil One was finally captured.
cards.name: Forbidden Resource

cards.flavor:
“Don't try to fight it. You belong to me now.”
—The Evil One

cards.flavor: Just like its master, it grows from others' pain.
cards.name: Herald of Oblivion
cards.text:
Flying
Herald of Oblivion enters with X -1/-1 counters on it, where X is your life total.

cards.flavor: Those who fought the war against the Evil One may be gone, but none forget their heroic deeds.
cards.name: Heroes of Wars Past
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Heroes of Wars Past attacks, attacking Human creatures get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Sometimes I envy those with boring minds: they don't get distracted as easily.”
—Merkurio Zellurys
cards.name: Hindered Research
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, that player mills two cards.

cards.name: Impulsive Spirit
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.flavor: It will cure your weakness, either by granting you strength or putting you out of your suffering.
cards.name: Inscrutable Elixir
cards.text:
{4}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{4}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.

cards.flavor: A Lafterii always enjoys a new challenge.
cards.name: Intellectual Incentive
cards.text: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. If that card is an instant or sorcery card, it costs {2} less to cast this turn.

cards.name: Intelligence
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{U}{R}: Target creature without prowess gains prowess until end of turn. Activate only if Intelligence is in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: People who think themselves they can be at a safe distance from a Danuri archer are usually lethally disappointed.
cards.name: Intrepid Shooter
cards.text:
Flash
When Intrepid Shooter enters, it deals 2 damage to target attacking creature.

cards.flavor: Gallord's shot struck Rallios straight in the heart. The second arrow pierced his head and the war was finally over.
cards.name: Kill Shot
cards.text: Destroy target attacking creature.

cards.name: Lafterii Charm
cards.text:
Choose one—
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card at random.

cards.flavor: “I have yet to find the situation in which illusion is not a viable solution.”
cards.name: Lafterii Guilemaster
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of Wizards you control.

cards.name: Lafterii Trickery
cards.text:
Reverberate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost. You may choose new targets for the copy.)
Target creature gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.text: When Landbirth Elemental enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.text:

{1}{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Landmender: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Elspeth knew she'd need to go all in if she was to help the Fellors achieve victory.
cards.name: Last Crusade
cards.text: Creatures you control get +X/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Most Lafterii elementals are born from the peninsula's lava fields, and are as unstable as the minds that brought them to existence.

cards.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Lavaspark Igniter: It deals 2 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Lumi Orthodox
cards.text:
Your opponents can't cast more than one spell each turn.

cards.flavor: To the Danuri, no companion is more loyal; to their enemies, no creature is more threatening.

Flying, haste

cards.flavor:
“Don't worry, I'm pretty sure you did your best.”
—Merkurio Zellurys
cards.name: Merkurio's Prowess
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} for each Wizard on the battlefield.

cards.name: Merkurio Zellurys
cards.text:
[+1]: Merkurio deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller may draw a card.
[-2]: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {U}{R} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Each instant and sorcery card you own has reverberate {X}, where X is its mana value.” (When you cast a spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost. You may choose new targets for the copy.)

cards.name: Military Gathering
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

cards.name: Mirror Image
cards.text:
Reverberate {3}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost. You may choose new targets for the copy.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.

cards.flavor: The last thing Pandora did before leaving forever was honor those who fell in the battle against the Evil One.
cards.name: Monument of War
cards.text: {5}, {T}, Exile a creature you control: Exile target creature.

cards.flavor:
“Your contraptions mean nothing to someone who can destroy them on mere contact.”
—Pandora, Warden of Khaliz-Dorahn

cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Nimble Elemental deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.flavor:
“Not even your ashes will remain.”
—Fellor insult

cards.text: Obliterating Blast deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way this turn can't be regenerated this turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: “Take this blessing with you, and remember you're fighting for the right cause.”
cards.name: Order's Anointer
cards.text: Identity — When Order's Anointer enters, if you control at least two other creatures that share a creature type with it, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: His enemies' suffering is nectar to his bloodthirsty heart.
cards.name: Painstriker
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever Painstriker attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature defending player controls.

cards.flavor: Pandora's hands had the ability to either give or take life. Everyone who knew her was careful to always be on her good side.
cards.name: Pandora's Mending
cards.text: Remove all counters from target creature. You gain 1 life for each counter removed this way.

cards.flavor: It took Elspeth and Rallios only a few seconds to start liking each other.

Enchant creature
Creatures blocking or blocked by enchanted creature have lifelink.

cards.flavor: When the phalanx assembles, it protects every individual from almost any harm.

cards.text: Identity — Phalanx's Shieldbearer has hexproof as long as you control at least two other creatures that share a creature type with it.

cards.flavor: With each death the Evil One's forces grow stronger.

Target player mills four cards.

cards.text: Mill X cards. Then you may return a creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Poisonblade Elite enters with three -1/-1 counters on it.
Whenever Poisonblade Elite becomes blocked, you may move a -1/-1 from it onto target creature blocking it.

cards.flavor: To join the Poisonblades, one had to pass through a ritual to learn to endure pain.
cards.name: Poisonblade Herald

cards.flavor: “You've learned to endure all forms of pain. Congratulations, you pass your trial.”

cards.text: {B}{G}, {T}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token.

cards.flavor: The Poisonblades were a special division of the Rehison army, lurking in the forests of the Isle ready to ambush any intruders.
cards.name: Poisonblade Trainee
cards.text: Poisonblade Trainee enters with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: The Rehisons used to coat their weapons in venoms to gain lethal advantage.

Enchant creature

cards.flavor: Rehison soldiers were famous for both their tactical precision and pernicious strikes.

cards.flavor: His clan gives him their full support, mainly because he'll beat those who don't.

cards.name: Undying Mobilizer
cards.text:
Zombiecycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Zombie card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Unearthed Legion
cards.text:
Unearthed Legion's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card.

cards.flavor: The Unknown Continent is believed to hold secrets like none ever seen on Khaliz-Dorahn.
cards.name: Unknown Shores
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Unstable Experiment

rulings.text: Any copies of Unstable Experiment are considered "reverberated", even if they weren't copied by the reverberate ability.

cards.text:
Reverberate {2}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost.)
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn. If Unstable Experiment is reverberated, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: He can be whatever he wants to be. Unfortunately for him, he doesn't know what he wants.
cards.name: Unstable Impersonator
cards.text: You may have Unstable Impersonator enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield chosen at random.

cards.flavor:
“You put a parasite in me and forced me to do your bidding. You're going to pay for this.”
—Elspeth, to Rallios
cards.name: Venomous Grasp
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Verdant Expanse
cards.text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Whenever a land you control enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Veteran's Plate
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
As long as equipped creature is a Soldier, it has vigilance.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Violent Spasm

rulings.text: Any copies of Violent Spasm are considered "reverberated", even if they weren't copied by the reverberate ability.

cards.text:
Reverberate {3}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it if you paid its reverberate cost.)
If Violent Spasm is reverberated, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. Violent Spasm deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

cards.flavor: The Gaali are the most empathic Danuri. Not only heal their people, they also inspire them.
cards.name: Voice of Gaalia
cards.text: Identity — Human creatures you control have lifelink as long as you control at least two creatures that share a creature type with Voice of Gaalia.

cards.flavor: Unlike the humans, Lafterii elementals can adopt both sources of mana. This, of course, doesn't make them any more stable.
cards.name: Volatile Elemental
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Volatile Elemental gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Voracious Howler
cards.text:
Double strike
Battalion — Whenever Voracious Howler and at least two other creatures attack, Voracious Howler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Wardbane Mystic
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an Elf spell, create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token.
Tap four untapped Druids you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: “Now Pandora left us, we are left to protect our home by ourselves.”
cards.name: Warden of Rehis-Dorahn
cards.text:
When Warden of Rehis-Dorahn enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.
{2}{B}{G}, {T}: Destroy target creature with a counter on it.

cards.flavor: Some creatures come alive from the thrill of the hunt.
cards.name: Warm Blood Chaser
cards.text: Warm Blood Chaser has flying and haste as long as you control a Goblin.

cards.name: Warrior's Blade
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
As long as equipped creature is a Warrior, it has first strike.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
“They rely too strongly on their weapons. We only need our minds.”
—Logayr, Lafterii Magistrate
cards.name: Weapon Smash
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: To claim New Fellorie as their own, the Fellors first had to confront its original habitants.
cards.name: Wild Raiders
cards.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

cards.flavor: It takes disease and turns it into raw strength.
cards.name: Wiltthorn Elemental
cards.text: {1}{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Wiltthorn Elemental gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Bond with one, and your limits will be unbound.”
—Lafterii Elementalist
cards.name: Windrider Elemental
cards.text:
Flying
When Windrider Elemental enters, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Wretched Spawn
cards.text:
When Wretched Spawn enters, you may return target permanent to its owner's hand. If you do, that player discards a card.
Unearth {4}{U}{B} ({4}{U}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: “The Fellors are growing stronger with each assault, the Order needs as many people as they can to fight!”
cards.name: Youthful Recruiter
cards.text: Soldiercycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Soldier card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

cards.name: Arcane Harvesters
cards.text:
{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{R}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Arcane Harvesters deals 1 damage to any target.
